dialogs.text: Do you know how many people are on social media?
dialogs.answer:
2 billion people worldwide are on social media

Facebook (2.167 billion users as of January 2018)

Youtube (1.5B)

WhatsApp (1.3B)

Facebook Messenger (1.3B)

WeChat (980M)
1/3 of this population accepts unknown friend requests

dialogs.text: How much time do they spend on social media?
dialogs.answer: 1/4 of online time is spent on social networks.
